articles.title: Regular Exercise And 4 Other Lifestyle Measures That Can Help You Be Cancer-Free, As Per WHO - NDTV
articles.description: Cancer: Tobacco use is considered to be a leading cause of cancer and death from cancer, according to National Cancer Institute. Regular use of tobacco or being exposed to secondhand smoke can increase risk of cancer.
articles.content:
